title: 27 Grand Residences
detail: 27 Grand Residences epitomizes luxury living with its 2 and 3 BHK homes, designed to offer both elegance and comfort. These upscale residences feature expansive layouts, high-end finishes, and contemporary design elements. Enjoy modern amenities such as climate-controlled living spaces, state-of-the-art kitchens, and stylish glass partitions. With private balconies that offer panoramic views and exclusive access to top-tier facilities like a fully-equipped gym and a sophisticated clubhouse, 27 Grand Residences is where sophistication meets convenience, creating a premium living experience in a desirable location.
developer_detail: Majestique Landmarks, is known for its diverse residential developments across Pune, catering to various demographics. Majestique has become synonymous with quality and customer satisfaction. Each completed project marks the happiness of numerous families, while ongoing endeavors reflect Majestique's commitment to innovation and excellence.
city_description: Balewadi, strategically located near major IT hubs in Pune, offers excellent connectivity and a thriving social infrastructure. Its diverse housing options cater to various budgets, while the presence of the Shree Shiv Chhatrapati Sports Complex adds a unique appeal. Balewadi High Street provides a vibrant shopping and dining experience, and the nearby Baner Pashan Biodiversity Park and Pashan Lake offer a tranquil retreat. With its blend of urban convenience and natural beauty, Balewadi is a sought-after destination for residents and businesses alike.
